get.description: Retrieve a collection of Break Rule Compliance Logs. You can search and filter the collection using query parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The collection items limit

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The collection items offset

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of fields you want returned separated by a coma. You can alias the returned field by adding the alias after a column

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Expand response to get full related object instead of ID. See the expand guide for more info.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The collection items sort field and order (prefix with "-" for descending sort].

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Global search for the object

parameters.name: [att]
parameters.description: Filter any attribute by its value. You can search sub-objects by using the qualified attribute name.

parameters.name: [att]:in
parameters.description: Filter the collection by attribute list.

parameters.name: [att]:contains
parameters.description: Search a specific attribute partially

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Return the list of inactive objects in the results. By default only active objects are returned

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Custom filter that could be applied to the collection. Filter by id

parameters.name: idIn
parameters.description: Custom filter that could be applied to the collection. Filter by a list of ids, seperated by a comma.

get.description: Display distance between the requester and the location

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Distance extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `distance`_.

schema.description: Display distance between the requester and the location

distance.description: Distance (in miles) between the requester and the location

get.description: Display site's hourly pay rate information

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Hourly Pay Rate extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `hourlyPayRate`_.

schema.description: Display site's hourly pay rate information

get.description: Display overtime hours that would be added to the requester's schedule by accepting this request

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Overtime Impact extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `overtimeImpact`_.

schema.description: Display overtime hours that would be added to the requester's schedule by accepting this request

hours.description: Overtime hours that would be added to the requester's schedule by accepting this request

get.description: Display present and total skill count

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Skill Count extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `skillCount`_.

schema.description: Display present and total skill count

present.description: Number of required skills fulfilled by the requester

total.description: Total number of hard and conditional skill requirements for this request

get.description: Display previous and next shift information

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Previous And Next Shift extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `aroundShifts`_.

schema.description: Display previous and next shift information

previous.description: Previous shift based on requested shift

next.description: Next shift based on requested shift

get.description: Display the amount of hours remaining until the weekly target hours are reached

parameters.name: extension
parameters.description: The extension name.

200.description: Remaining Weekly Hours extension. _Note: These fields will be added to the entity response under a new property named `weeklyHoursRemaining`_.

schema.description: Display the amount of hours remaining until the weekly target hours are reached

hours.description: The hours remaining until weekly target hours reached

get.description: Retrieve a collection of Shifts. You can search and filter the collection using query parameters.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Example of a **required filter** using the **id property**: `id:in=123,456`. 


At least one of the filters (on properties or scope) is `required`. Pseudo filters `:in` and `:between` can be used in
the filters on properties. For the properties of type *date-time* the maximum range for the `:between` pseudo filter is **1 month**.
For the pseudo filter `:in` the maximum allowed number of separated values by comma is **100**.

collectionRequiredFilter.name: filters
collectionRequiredFilter.description:
Example of a **required filter** using the **id property**: `id:in=123,456`. 


At least one of the filters (on properties or scope) is `required`. Pseudo filters `:in` and `:between` can be used in
the filters on properties. For the properties of type *date-time* the maximum range for the `:between` pseudo filter is **1 month**.
For the pseudo filter `:in` the maximum allowed number of separated values by comma is **100**.
